scripts.browserify:class: mkdir -p dist/class && browserify src/class/index.js -t babelify -o dist/class/build.js
scripts.browserify:polyfill: mkdir -p dist/polyfill && browserify src/polyfill/index.js -t babelify -o dist/polyfill/build.js
scripts.browserify:runtime: mkdir -p dist/runtime && browserify src/runtime/index.js -t babelify -o dist/runtime/build.js
